basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Spencer Tower. I am a software developer with a background in customer service, brewery production, and administration. I have a degree in nutrition and exercise science. I have previous experience working as an admin for a company that does code assessments for technology acquisitions. I decided that Software Development spoke to me because I want to work in a team environment with a strong sense of collaboration and creativity. I enjoy the problem solving, troubleshooting, and constant learning required in Software Development. I want to be part of something that is growing and solving new problems.

projects.title: Tipplr
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: BusMall
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing busmall application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
